Texto: 
n/a
follow-up and possible surgical excision
• multiple t2 hyperintense lesions in the basal ganglia and cerebellum.
• bilateral optic gliomas.
optic gliomas in a patient with neurofibromatosis 1.
• optic gliomas
• optic meningiomas
• optic neuritis
• demyelinating disease
• vasculitis
• low grade astrocytomas
6 year old boy for follow-up
